name: GROOOOARR
description:
SUMMARY

The tragic disaster came early on the Sunday morning. A massive monster attacked our city and people are devastated. 

We need to upgrade the buildings structure to save the city. 

The world needs a HERO!

and it needs it NOW.

======================

CAST

Hero:       

          

Monster : 

          

======================

CONTROLS

WASD - moving

U - repairs + upgrades

R - restart

======================

EXTRAS

As we're getting a lot of praise for our rocking soundtrack, we decided to release them for you to use as mobile ringtones. 

Please enjoy the files here below responsibly:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/6xx4x6sftrwasrr/MadBatGames%20NokiaJam%20GROOOOAAR%20T...
